A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Probably my least favourite Star Wars movie I've seen. Worse than the prequels. So many plot holes\, so many epic sub-plot setups from the previous movie that were scrapped. Just a mess! Very disappointing\, This movie makes it seem that there is no hope of another trilogy that is even close to the original. I struggle to see the last movie solving this mess. \nI only hope that the spin offs stay good.
